Description:
Detects activity when Windows Defender Firewall has been reset to its default configuration

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Windows Defender Firewall Has Been Reset To Its Default Configuration
Query: sourcetype='windows-firewall-as' eql select * from _source_ where (eventid = '2032' or eventid = '2060')
